name:
VAN HELSING SNIPER
ZX100
description:
If you like sniper arcade games and hunting vampires, there's nothing better than reincarnating as the best Vampire exterminator of all time: Van Helsing!!!

Take aim in the most natural way there is with your Nintendo 3DS™. With the motion sensor, turn your Nintendo 3DS™ into a mortal crossbow against the Vampires.

If your hand trembles a bit, don't worry: the option of slowing down time will help you aim with greater precision during difficult moments, as well as finding hidden Vampires with a special filter.

Search, aim and fire with resolve on all the blood-thirsty Vampires that are stalking humans in London, and face the terrifying Bosses.

You can also unlock a survival minigame if you earn the cursed score of 6 6 6 (pts).
